maththala guwan thotupole meheyum aarambha wu 2013 wasaredi maththala labu aadayama rupiyal miliyana 48ki.ema wasare wiyadama rupiyal miliyana 2828ki. 2018 wasare mayi masaya wana wita pamanak maththala guwanthotu pola rupiyal miliyana 14ka aadayamak laba athi namuth rupiyal miliyana 1,896ka paduwak siduwa thibe.me thula maththala guwanthotupola pawathinne kumana sthanayakada yanna liwiya yuthuma natha.ese nam kumak sidu kala yuthuda yanna thiranayak ganima sidu kala yuthuma karunaki.thawa duratath rate mahajanathawage kara mathama mema bara patawima palakayangeda wagakimak nowe.

ema gal stharaya matha gadolda, gadol matha ralu badamada, ralu badamaya matha thiruwanada,thiruwana matha yakada jalayakda, yakada jalaya matha suwandathi matida,suwandathi matta matha sudu pashanada, sudu pashana matha sel piliminida, ee matha gal puwaruda athurawana ladi.

giya sathiye ohu madhya wetha mese kiwe ya: “hethuwa kawarak wiya haki wuwath, parani parlimenthuwa yali kandawimata ma balaporoththu wanne naha..” “wyawasthamaya arbudayak nirmanaya kirimata” uthsaha daranne yayi ohu wiruddha pakshawalata chodana kale ya.

shri lankiya tharuna parapura dumwati uwanduren galawa ganima sandaha sigarat pakat matha siyayata 80ka pramanayak rupamaya saukhya anathuru angawima athulath kirima wenuwen rajaya gena thibena kriyamargaya sabawinma prashansaniya bawa da penwa dethi.dumwati bhawithayen thora shri lankawak nirmanaya kirima sandaha katayuthu kirima awashya wana athara ee wenuwen siyalu denagema sahayongaya awashya bawa shri lanka waidya sabhawe sabhapathi mahacharya kalo fonseka mahatha prakasha karayi.ee wenuwen wathman rajaya kriyamarga ganimin sitina bawa penwa dena ee mahatha me karyayedi widwathun pirisak athwal bandagena sitima sathutata karunak bawada ee mahatha sandahan karayi.me sambandhayen adahas dakwana waidya samadhi rajapaksha mahatha sandahan karanne miliyana 20k wasaya karana shri lankawe dumbima hethuwen warshikawa 20,000k pamana miyayana bawath dumbima hethuwen athiwana saukhyamaya haniyata amatharawa ee ha samana ayurin winashakari aarthika paduwak ratathula siduwana bawathya.me wanawita rate pawathina wishalathama thrasthawadaya meya bawa penwa dena ee mahatha 2012 wasare agosthu masa 08da sigarat pakat matha siyayata 80ka pramanayak rupamaya saukhya anathuru angawima athulath kirima sambandhayen gasat niwedanaya prakashayata pathkala bawada me wasare pebarawari masa 19 da parlimenthuwe di siyalu manthriwarunge anumathiya labi thibena bawada sandahan karayi.dumkola samagam wisin rajaye kriyamargayata wirodhaya palakaramin nadu pawara thibena bawada ee sambandhayen wana thinduwa ada (12) prakashayata pathkirimata niyamitha bawada ee mahatha penwa deyi.jiwaka padanama pasugiya warsha 20ka kalayedi dumkola bhawithayata erehiwa katayuthu kara thibena bawa sihipath karana waidya samadhi rajapaksha mahatha ee wenuwen me rate widwathun wishala pirisak katayuthu karana bawada kiya siti..
